data.title: Nadie es perfecto © 2023
data.meta_description: We are Nadie es Perfecto, an independent film production company with 20 years of experience in the production of films, documentaries, and TV series.
data.text:
OUR PRODUCTION COMPANY

We are

Nadie Es Perfecto

We are Nadie es Perfecto, an independent film production company with 20 years of experience in the production of films, documentaries, and TV series.

KNOW HOW

What sets us apart

Apostamos

WE BET ON

Talent, whether it be emerging or established. We have worked with directors, like Álex de la Iglesias, David Marqués, Kepa Sojo, Denis Rovira, Zoe Berriatúa, Eduardo Casanova, and David Galán Galindo, in some cases we even produced their debut feature.

Producimos

WE PRODUCE

From the beginning to the end. We understand film production as an independent and creative outlet. We are 100% involved in each project, from the script to the premiere, and we do it alleven the impossible to ensure the film moves forward smoothly.

Conectamos

WE CONNECT

Genre or auteur cinema to the general public. To do this, we work with all major networks, like Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Universal, Sony, Paramount, RTVE, Movistar, Mediaset and Atresmedia, and we also participate in the most prestigious film festivals.

OUR PROJECTS

Featured productions

LA NAVIDAD EN SUS MANOS

DISCO, IBIZA, LOCOMÍA

PERFECTOS DESCONOCIDOS

EL COVER

EL JUEGO DE LAS LLAVES

MORE ABOUT OUR WORK

Interested in what we do?

Discover the passion and dedication behind each production in our work gallery.

Photo gallery

behind the scenes

Delve into the fascinating world behind the scenes and discover how our productions come to life.
